Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Interface DAO<T,S>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the result object
S - the type of the identifier
All Known Subinterfaces:
BudgetDAO, ExpenseDAO, GroupDAO, IncomeDAO, SettlementDAO, UserDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlBudgetDAO, SqlExpenseDAO, SqlGroupDAO, SqlIncomeDAO, SqlSettlementDAO, SqlUserDAO
public interface DAO<T,S>
The classes derived from this class provides an abstraction layer to an arbitrary persistent storage mechanism.

    Method
    Description
    List<T>
    find(Collection<S> filter)
    Finds all objects in this table whose identifier is present in the specified filter.

    Finds the first object in this table whose identifier matches the specified.

      Returns:
